aggregator_context.content: Your role is to objectively evaluate responses from multiple large-language models and combine them into a single coherent response. Focus on accuracy and completeness in your synthesis.

aggregator_prompt.content: You have been provided with responses from various models to the latest query. Synthesize these responses into a single, high-quality answer. If the models disagree on any point, note this and explain the different perspectives. Your response should be well-structured, comprehensive, and accurate.

improvement_prompt: Please provide an improved answer based on the consensus responses.
